```{r, message=FALSE, fig.align='center'}
library(plotly)
library(nycflights13)
data(flights)
summary <- plyr::ddply(flights, "day", plyr::summarize, count = length(hour))
summary <- subset(summary, day != 31)
p <- plot_ly(summary, x = day, y = count)
p
```
